title: Obsession
abstract: Overworking is a common topic that has lingered as a problem in the current generation. As a result oftentimes we are often blind sided by our work and cared less toward others especially our family and significant others. This project Aims to describe the experience of the common folks that are blind sided by their work and hopefully able to inspire and remind the audience that life is more than just work and that relationships are also as important.
creators: DYLAN HIZKIA TAN; JESSICA ANDREA WIDJOJORAGA; CALVIN ANDREW GOENADI
contributors: Balgum Song, MFA (Advisor 1); Sojin Kim, MFA (Advisor and Examination Committee)
source: Audio Visual dan Animasi No. 00190005/IDM/2023; Dylan Hizkia Tan (E12190221), Jessica Andrea Widjojoraga (E12190001), Calvin Andrew Goenadi (E12190227)
subjects: MENTAL FATIGUE--FAMILY RELATIONSHIPS; VISUAL COMMUNICATION; ANIMATION (CINEMATOGRAPHY)--DESIGN; GRAPHIC ARTS
